title: Getting Real with the Roland TR8s
description:
I have a new preset pack for the Roland TR8s available to all users. It's called "Fractured Horizons" and offers 16 patterns for performance or inspiration  Download the TR-8S Production Pack today—available at no charge for Roland Account holders in Roland Cloud Manager.

In this video, we'll make a kit and pattern with the Roland TR8s and talk about what makes this drum machine good and bad. Join me, please. 

Get a Roland TR-8s
At Patchwerks: https://shrsl.com/3tjt3
At Perfect Circuit: http://bit.ly/3OQhxsl

Join me on Patreon and get access to music, presets, samples, and a great community: http://bit.ly/rmrpatreon
